name: Paper King | Solution Finder
description:
Left Click - Add Enemy
Right Click - Delete Enemy
R - Replay Solution
Backspace - Clear Board

Stuck on a Puzzle? Use this solution finder to skip the thinking and go straight to smacking Goombats with your Legendary Hammer! Use the Solution Browser on the right, OR edit the circle on the left directly and press the Load button at the bottom.

Note: This is NOT an AI to solve any puzzle. It's just a visual answer key for any of the 30+ puzzles in its database, and I'm open to adding more!
